entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
